thread.title: Ruby Rose sees a ‘crazy’ gunman in her backyard | dailytelegraph.com.au
thread.title_full: Ruby Rose sees a ‘crazy’ gunman in her backyard | dailytelegraph.com.au

author: Network writers
title: Ruby Rose sees a ‘crazy’ gunman in her backyard | dailytelegraph.com.au
text:
AUSTRALIA’S latest Hollywood export Ruby Rose has tweeted of her terror after seeing a “crazy” gunman in her backyard before he was arrested.
The Orange Is The New Black star tweeted today that there was a gunman in her backyard of her home in the US, and there were helicopters, police and dogs chasing him.
Minutes later she tweeted again saying he had been arrested.
There is a gunman in my back yard. This is petrifying. Helicopters, police, dogs... And a crazy person.
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) July 23, 2015
Man arrested. Wow. Crazy. Annnd now I won't be watching horror films before bed anymore.
— Ruby Rose (@RubyRose) July 23, 2015 Rose later posted a video on her Instagram of police cars looking for the gunman as the helicopter hovered over her house.
Warning: Video contains language which may upset some readers.
Ruby Rose sees a gunman (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/5d_FsVsZSN/embed .)
Originally published as Ruby sees a gunman in her backyard
